summary: After a college student is tapped to join the elite secret Skulls fraternity, he witnesses a girl's death and his life starts falling apart.
cast: Robin Dunne|Nathan West|Ashley Tesoro|Lindy Booth|James Gallanders|Christopher Ralph|Aaron Ashmore|Andrew Gillies|Stephen Young|Simon Reynolds|Ardon Bess|Sandi Ross|Margot Gagnon|Patric Masurkevitch|R.D. Reid|Edie Inksetter|Scott Wickware|William Lazar|Michael Sercerchi
title: The Skulls II
